title: (Batch) Fully Homomorphic Encryption over Integers for Non-Binary Message Spaces.
abstract: In this paper, we construct a fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) scheme over integers with the message space \(\mathbb {Z}_Q\) for any prime \(Q\). Even for the binary case \(Q=2\), our decryption circuit has a smaller degree than that of the previous scheme; the multiplicative degree is reduced from \(O(\lambda (\log \lambda )^2)\) to \(O(\lambda )\), where \(\lambda \) is the security parameter. We also extend our FHE scheme to a batch FHE scheme.
departments: National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology
